title: A Matter of survival
creator_credit: Tasfilm Productions, National Fitness Council of Tasmania, Don Anderson and Rodney Musch
brief_description: Set in the rugged Cradle Mountain region of Tasmania, this film points out the dangers of exposure for those who go into the mountains unprepared. An experienced group of walkers demonstrate, equipment, clothing, food, and techniques suitable for bushwalking.
creator_credit_for_label: Tasfilm Productions, National Fitness Council of Tasmania, Don Anderson and Rodney Musch
